lzh: 式叉摩尼亦如是。乃至已聞者當重聞。
en: With a sikkhamānā it’s also as above. … Those who have already heard it should listen again:

lzh: 若比丘尼不病。令式叉摩尼揩摩者波夜提
en: If a bhikkhunī who isn’t sick has a sikkhamānā massage her, it’s a pācittiya.”

lzh: 式叉摩尼者隨順行十八事。二年學戒。使揩摩者如上比丘尼中說。
en: “A sikkhamānā” means someone who follows and practises the 18 matters and trains in these precepts for two years. (If a bhikkhunī) has her give a massage, it should be explained as above in the rule about “a bhikkhunī”.
